setting.name: *debugConsole
setting.desc: Set to true to log to debug console

setting.name: *msgIncludeFilter
setting.desc: PREG pattern of message inclusion (executed before exclude filter)

setting.name: *msgExcludeFilter
setting.desc: PREG pattern of message exclusion (executed before include filter)

setting.name: *locationIncludeFilter
setting.desc: PREG pattern of location inclusion (executed before exclude filter). Location is in format 'file:line'. Example pattern: 'admin_client\.lua:123'.

setting.name: *locationExcludeFilter
setting.desc: PREG pattern of location exclusion (executed after include filter). Location is in format 'file:line'. Example pattern: 'admin_client\.lua:123'.
